message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still not convinced that $17,000 is a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $13,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
